Vehicle.Name: Imperial Floating Fortress
Vehicle.Description: [H3]Imperial Floating Fortress[h3] Designed as an urban counterpart to the AT-AT walker, the Floating Fortress is better at navigating the narrow streets and sharp corners of dense cities. It also has sophisticated sensor software known as a target identification network (TIN). [P]In addition, the Floating Fortress is mounted with comm jammers that require a successful [B]Formidable ([DI][DI][DI][DI]) Computers check[b] to bypass within long range.

Mod.MiscDesc: [B]Target Identification Network (TIN)[b]: Add [BO] to all Computers checks to use sensors.
[B]Comm Jammers[b]: Jams all comms traffic within long range. Requires a successful [B]Formidable ([DI][DI][DI][DI][DI]) Computers check[b] to bypass.

Vehicle.Crew: One pilot, one co-pilot, two gunners
